price: ឱបណ្ដាអ្នកមានជំនឿ. ចូរពួកអ្នកកោតខ្លាចអល់ឡោះ និងត្រូវនិយាយពាក្យសំដីណាដែលល្អត្រឹមត្រូវ។
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَقُولُواْ قَوۡلٗا سَدِيدٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha waqūlū qawlan sadīdan
